title: AI-Powered Public Procurement Platform Development
organization: Estonian Ministry of Economic Affairs and Communications
description: Development of an advanced AI-powered platform for streamlining public procurement processes in Estonia. The solution should include automated tender matching, intelligent document analysis, and predictive analytics for procurement optimization.

title: Green Energy Infrastructure for Public Buildings
description: Installation of solar panels, heat pumps, and energy management systems across 25 public buildings in Tallinn. The project aims to reduce carbon emissions by 40% and achieve energy cost savings of 30% within three years.

title: Digital Health Records Integration System
description: Development and implementation of a comprehensive digital health records integration system connecting hospitals, clinics, and pharmacies across Estonia. Must comply with GDPR and Estonian data protection regulations.

title: Smart City Transportation Management Platform
description: Implementation of an intelligent transportation management system including real-time traffic monitoring, public transport optimization, and integrated mobility-as-a-service platform for Tartu city.

title: Cybersecurity Assessment and Enhancement Services
description: Comprehensive cybersecurity assessment of critical government infrastructure, including penetration testing, vulnerability analysis, and implementation of enhanced security measures. Must comply with NIS2 directive requirements.
